thread.title: Great Hotel in Rome!
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in Rome! - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: EdWiz
title: Great Hotel in Rome!
text:
Hotel Artemide is a fantastic hotel located in the heart of Rome a few blocks from the Termini Station.
Our family of four stayed in one of the junior suites during our visit in February. Wr booked the Hotel Artemide after reading the good reviews on Trip Advisor. The Hotel Atryude did not disappoint!
Our suite on the second floor was very spacious overlooking the Via Nazionale.
The complimentary mini bar was stocked with juice, wine, and beer which was refilled daily.
Breakfast was included and had a good selection of breakfast choices, meats, and cheeses,
We were able to walk to the Trevi Fountain, Roman Forum, and Spanish Steps.
There is. Subway stop (Repubblica) two blocks up which we used to go to the Collesium and Vatican.
We really enjoyed our stay at Hotel Artemide and would recommend it if your looking for a great hotel in Rome!
